class.name: GFQuerylikeBuilder
class.brief_description: The abstract base class for different query-like builders.

method.name: access_default
method.description: Marks the last added term as default.

method.name: access_filter
method.description: Marks the last added term as a filter. Filters will not trigger observers, but they will still be required for them to match.

method.name: access_in
method.description: Marks the last added term read only.

method.name: access_inout
method.description: Marks the last added term read and write.

method.name: access_none
method.description: Marks the last added term as never accessed. This will also cause the term to not be passed to systems, queryies, or observers.

method.name: access_out
method.description: Marks the last added term write only.

method.name: is_built
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this builder has been built.

method.name: maybe_with
method.description: Adds an optional term to the query. The term added is identified by a [Variant] coerced to an ID. To learn more about [Variant] coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].

method.name: or_with
method.description: Adds a term to the query that matches this or one of the previous terms in an [i]or[/i] chain. The term added is identified by a [Variant] coerced to an ID. To learn more about [Variant] coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].

method.name: with
method.description: Adds a term to the query. The term added is identified by a [Variant] coerced to an ID. To learn more about [Variant] coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].

method.name: without
method.description: Adds a negative term to the query. The term added is identified by a [Variant] coerced to an ID. To learn more about [Variant] coercion see [method GFWorld.coerce_id].
